sentences.sContent: A hospital administrator has resigned over claims he lied to get the job.
sentences.sCn: 一位医院主管因为有人声称他的职位是骗来的而辞职了。

remMethod.val: re(不) ＋ sign(记号) → 不加记号 → 放弃

words.tran: 顺从的；已辞职的；己放弃的

trans.tranOther: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

trans.tranCn: 辞去， 放弃； 使听从， 使顺从
trans.tranOther: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
